advisories.title: Sell During Peak Demand
advisories.message: Monitor market prices daily and sell when demand is highest to maximize profit.

advisories.title: Prepare for Heavy Rains
advisories.message: Heavy rainfall is expected in some regions. Ensure crops are well-drained to prevent losses.

advisories.title: Plan Transport Early
advisories.message: Secure transport ahead of harvest time to reduce post-harvest spoilage.
